original: @428b rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @428b rgya gar skad du /

original: a'arya aa bhi shinytsa ni n'a ma dha n'i /
analyzed: a'arya aa bhi shinytsa ni n'a ma dha n'i /

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /

original: 'phags pa dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
analyzed: 'phags pa dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs /

original: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
translated: Thus have I heard at one time.

original: bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa /
translated: The Blessed One was dwelling in Śrāvastī, in the Jeta Grove, in the park of Anāthapiṇḍada, together with a great saṅgha of monks and countless bodhisattvas,

original: sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /
analyzed: sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /
translated: who had served the victorious ones of the past.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One said to the venerable Śāriputra:

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /

original: khyod kyis 'de lta ste /
analyzed: khyod kyis 'de lta ste /
translated: you should recite this dhāraṇī,🔽which is called 'Empowerment,'

original: byang chub sems dpa'i ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi spyod pa dang / bden pa'i smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpas yongs su bzung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos 'di dag sgoms shig /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi spyod pa dang / bden pa'i smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpas yongs su bzung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos 'di dag sgoms shig /
translated: You should cultivate these dharmas of the bodhisattvas: the mother of the bodhisattvas, the previous conduct of the bodhisattvas, the aspiration for the truth, being upheld by the bodhisattvas, and the dhāraṇī.

original: ston cig / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: ston cig / 'di lta ste /

original: gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs so //
analyzed: gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs so //
translated: It is the dhāraṇī, the Dharma discourse.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Śāriputra said to the Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

original: gzungs ni / yul la mi gnas /
analyzed: gzungs ni / yul la mi gnas /
translated: if the dhāraṇī does not abide in a place

original: phyogs na mi gnas na /
analyzed: phyogs na mi gnas na /
translated: and does not abide in a direction,

original: bcom @429a *// ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom @429a *// ldan 'das /

analyzed: gzungs zhes bgyi ba la /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: gzungs zhes bgyi ba 'di'i tshig gi don gang lags /

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to /🔽sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to / sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: When this was said, the Blessed One said to the venerable Śāriputra,

original: legs so legs so /
analyzed: legs so legs so /

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /

original: khyod 'di ltar theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dang / theg pa chen po la mngon par brtson pa dang / theg pa chen po lhag par byed pa dang / khyod gzugs yul na mi gnas /
analyzed: khyod 'di ltar theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dang / theg pa chen po la mngon par brtson pa dang / theg pa chen po lhag par byed pa dang / khyod gzugs yul na mi gnas /
translated: You have taught that form does not abide in a place

original: phyogs na mi gnas par ston pa yang legs so //
analyzed: phyogs na mi gnas par ston pa yang legs so //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /

original: gzungs ni / chos nyid kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gzungs ni / chos nyid kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba ma yin te /
translated: the dhāraṇī is not past, future, or present, because of the nature of dharmas.

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /

original: gzungs ni / 'das pa zhes mi 'chad /
analyzed: gzungs ni / 'das pa zhes mi 'chad /
translated: the dhāraṇī is not taught as past,

original: ma 'ongs pa zhes mi 'chad /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa zhes mi 'chad /

original: da ltar byung ba zhes mi 'chad /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba zhes mi 'chad /

analyzed: dngos por mi 'chad /

original: dngos po med par mi 'chad /
analyzed: dngos po med par mi 'chad /

original: mtshan ma dang / mtshan ma med par mi 'chad /🔽chos gang skye ba'i phyir ram /
analyzed: mtshan ma dang / mtshan ma med par mi 'chad / chos gang skye ba'i phyir ram /
translated: not taught as a sign, and not taught as signless.🔽It is not taught for the sake of the arising

original: 'gag pa'i phyir mi 'chad mod kyi /
analyzed: 'gag pa'i phyir mi 'chad mod kyi /

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /

original: 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' la phan par bzhed pa'i phyir chos ston te /
analyzed: 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' la phan par bzhed pa'i phyir chos ston te /
translated: nevertheless, the Dharma is taught for the sake of benefiting bodhisattvas.

original: gang 'di chos kyi rnam grangs kyi gzungs ni /
analyzed: gang 'di chos kyi rnam grangs kyi gzungs ni /
translated: This dhāraṇī of the Dharma discourse

original: gzungs med par bya ba'i lam du gyur pa /
analyzed: gzungs med par bya ba'i lam du gyur pa /
translated: is the path to make dhāraṇīs nonexistent.

original: rigs pa'i stobs kyis gnas pa /
analyzed: rigs pa'i stobs kyis gnas pa /
translated: It is based on the power of reasoning,

original: sangs rgyas kyi yon @429b tan; sangs rgyas kyi lhag par bya ba sgrub pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi yon @429b tan; sangs rgyas kyi lhag par bya ba sgrub pa /
translated: it accomplishes the special qualities of the buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims /🔽sangs rgyas kyi bsdus pa /🔽sangs rgyas kyi mtshams sbyor ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims / sangs rgyas kyi bsdus pa / sangs rgyas kyi mtshams sbyor ba /
translated: it is the morality of the buddhas,🔽it is the collection of the buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'byung ba'o //
translated: it is the connection with the buddhas,🔽and it is the appearance of the buddhas.”

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Śāriputra said to the Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

original: gang la gnas shing gzungs de thob na /
analyzed: gang la gnas shing gzungs de thob na /
translated: when bodhisattvas attain that dhāraṇī by abiding in it,

original: byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ba las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / dam bca' ba bzang ba dang / chos la mi gnas pa dang / bdag the tshom ma mchis pa dang / slob dpon ma mchis pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ba las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / dam bca' ba bzang ba dang / chos la mi gnas pa dang / bdag the tshom ma mchis pa dang / slob dpon ma mchis pa dang /
translated: they will not turn back from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, they will have good commitments, they will not abide in the Dharma, they will have no doubts, they will have no teacher,

original: rang gi lam la gnas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol /
analyzed: rang gi lam la gnas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol /
translated: Please explain to us who abide in our own path the teaching of the Blessed One.

original: bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; sh'a ri'i bu /

original: legs so legs so //
analyzed: legs so legs so //
translated: The Blessed One said, “Excellent, Śāriputra, excellent!

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /

original: gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
analyzed: gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
translated: a bodhisattva who has attained retention

original: sangs rgyas nyid du brjod do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid du brjod do //
translated: is said to be a buddha.

original: sh'a ri'i bu /🔽gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa la bsti stang byed dam /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu / gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa la bsti stang byed dam /

original: bla mar byed dam /🔽rim gror byed dam /
analyzed: bla mar byed dam / rim gror byed dam /
translated: and worships a bodhisattva who has attained retention

original: mchod na / des sangs rgyas thams cad la bsti stang byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mchod na / des sangs rgyas thams cad la bsti stang byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: will have honored all the buddhas.

original: gang dag gis gzungs 'di thos pa dang / gang dag mos pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas ji lta ba de bzhin du mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur zhing /🔽byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral @430a *//
analyzed: gang dag gis gzungs 'di thos pa dang / gang dag mos pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas ji lta ba de bzhin du mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur zhing / byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral @430a *//
translated: Those who hear this retention and have faith in it will be worthy of worship just like the Buddha,

original: bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and they will never be separated from the thought of awakening.

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /

analyzed: sarba pra ti dzny'a /

analyzed: aa ha ra dzny'a na pa ti /

analyzed: autpa da ni /

analyzed: aa bhi bha ha ra /

analyzed: aa bhi pa tsa /

analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu / 'di dag ni /

original: dbang bskur pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi ming rnams te /🔽'das pa rnams dang / ma 'ongs pa rnams dang da ltar byung ba rnams dang legs par gnas pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' gang gis legs par bzung ste 'chad pa de /
analyzed: dbang bskur pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi ming rnams te / 'das pa rnams dang / ma 'ongs pa rnams dang da ltar byung ba rnams dang legs par gnas pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' gang gis legs par bzung ste 'chad pa de /
translated: these are the names of the dharmas of the dhāraṇī called the consecration.🔽If any bodhisattva upholds and explains well

original: myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir bskal ba brgya dang / bskal pa stong dag tu smon lam gyis zad par byed par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir bskal ba brgya dang / bskal pa stong dag tu smon lam gyis zad par byed par mi 'gyur /
translated: those of the past, future, and present, they will not exhaust their aspirations for hundreds and thousands of eons in order to quickly attain perfect buddhahood.

original: de la mtshon gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur /
analyzed: de la mtshon gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur /
translated: They will not be harmed by weapons.

original: me dang srog chags mi srun pa rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: me dang srog chags mi srun pa rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not be harmed by fire or by vicious animals.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: 'di ltar sh'a ri'i bu; gzungs 'di ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar sh'a ri'i bu; gzungs 'di ni /

original: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum mo //
analyzed: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum mo //
translated: is the mother of the buddhas of the past.

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /

original: rigs kyi bu'am /🔽rigs kyi bu mo gang la las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i grangs /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am / rigs kyi bu mo gang la las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i grangs /
translated: if a son or daughter of good family

original: med pa bcu mthar chags su gang ba'i sangs rgyas rnams lan bza' dang / zhal zas bzang pos bskal pa grangs med par dbul ba byas pa bas /
analyzed: med pa bcu mthar chags su gang ba'i sangs rgyas rnams lan bza' dang / zhal zas bzang pos bskal pa grangs med par dbul ba byas pa bas /
translated: were to offer food and drink of excellent flavor to the buddhas, as many as there are grains of sand in the Ganges, for eons equal in number to the grains of sand in the Ganges,

original: rigs kyi bu'am @430b rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang gis gzungs 'di las tha na tshig gcig tsam bzung ba de pas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am @430b rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang gis gzungs 'di las tha na tshig gcig tsam bzung ba de pas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do //
translated: a son or daughter of good family who memorizes even just one verse from this dhāraṇī will generate merit that is far greater than that.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /

original: dbang bskur ba'i gzungs 'di ni /
analyzed: dbang bskur ba'i gzungs 'di ni /

original: sangs rgyas kyi yum yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi yum yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is the mother of the buddhas.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
translated: The Blessed One having spoken thus, those monks, those bodhisattvas, and the world with its gods, humans, asuras, and gandharvas rejoiced and praised what the Blessed One had said.

original: 'phags pa dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags pa dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The noble Dhāraṇī of Empowerment is complete.

original: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin mi tra dang / d'a n'a sh'i la dang / zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba bandhe ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa /
analyzed: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin mi tra dang / d'a n'a sh'i la dang / zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba bandhe ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa /
translated: Translated, edited, and finalized by the Indian preceptors Jinamitra and Dānaśīla, and the chief editor and translator Bandé Yeshé Dé, having been revised with the new terminology.
